comment.author: 54289096@N00
comment._content: Much of the graffiti of the pre-50s were considered 'hobo markings' that would indicate such things as "where a train slows down" or "no night watchman" or "this lady will feed you" etc.  I wonder if this is such a mark?

comment.author: 21060829@N05
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Railroad Crossings of the World, and we'd love to have this added to the group!
